law.catch_line: Voidable contracts for sale of printed material.
law.text: All orders or contracts for magazines, periodicals, encyclopedias, books, Bibles, or other printed matter or material shall be void and unenforceable at the option of the purchaser if the person or persons soliciting such order or contract is in violation of the provisions of KRS 367.513 and 367.515.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 281, sec. 4, effective July 1, 1974. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 2.
